Plot: Grief-stricken by a recent tragedy, Jennifer returns to the resort village where she grew up to help her beloved grandmother. There, Jennifer will discover new meaning in life and experience not one, but two of the most amazing love stories ever.
Characters: Jennifer, Dr Brendan Keller, Samantha (Sam) Standford, (Doc) Reverend John Farley, Dr Max Weisberg, Jean Sheridan, Sam Deegan, Shep Martin, Henry Bullock
